solution_line_template: 50% of the vote is {votes_for_50_percent} votes because {total_students} x {win_percentage_decimal} = <<{total_students}*{win_percentage_decimal}={votes_for_50_percent}>>{votes_for_50_percent}
She gets {votes_from_boys} votes from boys because {num_boys} x {male_vote_percentage_decimal} = <<{num_boys}*{male_vote_percentage_decimal}={votes_from_boys}>>{votes_from_boys}
She needs {votes_needed_from_girls} votes from girls because {votes_to_win} - {votes_from_boys} = <<{votes_to_win}-{votes_from_boys}={votes_needed_from_girls}>>{votes_needed_from_girls}

She needs a proportion of {proportion_girls_votes} of girl's votes to win because {votes_needed_from_girls} / {num_girls} = <<{votes_needed_from_girls}/{num_girls}={proportion_girls_votes}>>{proportion_girls_votes}

The percentage she needs is {female_vote_percentage_needed} because {percentage_multiplier} x {proportion_girls_votes} = <<{percentage_multiplier}*{proportion_girls_votes}={female_vote_percentage_needed}>>{female_vote_percentage_needed}
